sentences.en: A fluid may flow through a maze of tiny channels , bifurcating and recombining randomly.
sentences.cn: 流体可以经过很小的、完全随机地分开又重新结合的,错综复杂的渠道而流动.

sentences.en: An increased velocity is randomly dispersed.
sentences.cn: 增加的速度任意地四散传播.

sentences.en: Because computers are precise instruments , they are not designed to think randomly.
sentences.cn: 因为电脑是精密仪器, 用电脑选号随机性不强.

sentences.en: But assigning the vouchers randomly guarded against this risk.
sentences.cn: 但随意分配补助则能够避免这种风险.

sentences.en: Hybrid events occur randomly in Animal Crossing: Wild World game.
sentences.cn: 混合的事件在动物穿过过程中随机发生? 荒凉的世界游戏.

sentences.en: If measurement errors occur randomly, one can expect their mean to approach zero.
sentences.cn: 如果测量误差随机产生, 可以期望他们的平均值近于零.

sentences.en: If the X input occurs randomly, then the operation may be quite different.
sentences.cn: 如果输入信号X随机地出现, 那么工作情况可能完全不同.

sentences.en: In a paramagnetic material the directions of the magnetic moments vary randomly from atom to atom.
sentences.cn: 在顺磁材料中,磁矩的方向在原子之间随意变化.

sentences.en: In that case: Create a room without name and wait until other players join it randomly.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下：创建一个没有名字的房间，等待其他玩家加入随机。

sentences.en: It adds randomly - generated patterns of notes to a song.
sentences.cn: 该软件添加随机生成的记录样本到一首歌曲当中.

sentences.en: It mimics a memory leak by randomly placing some of these arrays (~20% of them) into a list.
sentences.cn: 它通过随机将这些数组的一部分（大约 20%）放入一个列表来模拟内存泄漏。

sentences.en: Methods: 30 rats were divided into three groups randomly: LI, KI and KIO 3 guoup.
sentences.cn: 方法: 将低碘wistar大鼠30只随机分为3组.低碘组(LI), 碘化钾组(KI),碘酸钾组(KIO3).

sentences.en: My phone seems to switch itself off randomly.
sentences.cn: 我的手机好像随时自动关机。

sentences.en: The eight chromosomes were randomly distributed at metaphase I.
sentences.cn: 在中期Ⅰ8对染色体的分布是无秩序的.

sentences.en: The winning numbers are randomly selected by computer.
sentences.cn: 中奖号码是由电脑随机选取的。

sentences.en: These filaments contain defects randomly distributed along the length.
sentences.cn: 这些单丝的缺陷沿长度随意地分布.

sentences.en: They throw out all of these behaviors randomly.
sentences.cn: 它们的这些行为都是随机的。

sentences.en: This energy, called heat energy, is randomly distributed among the atoms.
sentences.cn: 这些能量统称为热能, 它不规则地分布在各个原子之间.

sentences.en: Transformed cells are loosely attached, rounded and randomly oriented.
sentences.cn: 转化细胞则不大贴壁 、 圆缩并呈杂乱分布.

sentences.en: Within the hot gas chamber, molecules are moving randomly in all directions.
sentences.cn: 在灼热的气体燃烧室内, 分子在各个方向上作无规运动.

words.tran_cn: [数] 随机的；任意的；胡乱的
[数] 随机化，不规则分布；随机选择
使随机化；做任意排列（randomize的过去分词）
使随机化；（使）作任意排列或不规则分布
随便地，任意地；无目的，胡乱地；未加计划地

trans.tran_en: Without method or conscious decision; indiscriminately.
